website_summaries.verdict: Unique design and quality glass is perfect for regular use, or as a beautiful display in your home.
pros: Glasses sit on a sturdy, elegant wooden base
Included decanter designed to look like a globe with a beautiful glass ship inside
Glasses are etched with stunning map design
The perfect set to put on display in your home
cons: Glasses are delicate and thin, must be hand washed, and handled with care

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of this product; however, the quality is terrible. Be aware that this is a NON-REFUNDABLE item. The decanter feels like a Christmas ornament and the topper is an extremely lightweight plastic. I was planning on gifting this to my boss and checked it out when I got it. At first all seemed well, until I put the topper in the bottle. The plastic "seal" ripped off the topper on the first use and everything is very flimsy and cheaply mass-produced. Do not expect a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Almost Amazing... But Still Great
customer_reviews.text: There are a bunch of mixed reviews here, but I went ahead and ordered. It was part of a Father's Day gift, it was a hit. Here are my thoughts though: 1. The stand is great! HQ 2. Glasses are nice and thick. ... Beautiful! 3. The globe/ decanter seems very fragile and a bit thin. 4. The stopper is a very yellow gold. Looks cheap to me. LQ material. Kinda kills the look. If you're going to go gold, to it right or opt for a sliver type finish. Again though, it was a great gift and I filled it with balvenie 12 year single barrel. My husband loved the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Broken and no returns
customer_reviews.text: My product came broken and there was no return replacement. This was supposed to be a Christmas present. Not fair and really upset.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetkisez

customer_reviews.title: Best deal, FANTASTIC quality, going to buy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning. I loved it so much I’m actually getting ones for everyone in my family! Great price, great gift! I didn’t even know it came with glasses, but they’re beautiful. The wood is sturdy and gives off a natural/manly vibe. Be sure to invest in a decanter cleaning kit too, because you can never be too careful with this treasure :)
customer_reviews.author: James Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Really Small and does not allow return
customer_reviews.text: Decantour is really small and glass ship just looks like it is sinking. Worst of all for some reason we are not allowed to return it even though it is on prime.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Reitz

customer_reviews.title: It's a good gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my dad and he liked it. It's pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my high expectations!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it was packaged safely... I was concerned about the ship inside the decanter. It was perfectly packed and in perfect condition when I received it. It exceeded my expectations in craftsmanship but it’s also bigger than I expected. I don’t have small hands at all, big country girl and you can see the size of the main price in my hand. I would definitely gift this to myself in the future but this one is for my big bro... I’m overly picky on his bday gift and this has very much pleased and satisfied me especially since it was only $50.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Urena

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase. Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband last Christmas, and he's had it on display, full of bourbon, every day since then. He loves it. He keeps it on his bar and offers guests drinks with it. The glass is beautiful and sturdy, the wood is a lovely, dark real wood, and the glasses are perfectly complimentary and dishwasher safe. It's VERY giftable if you have a liquor drinker in your life that also likes to host or has a nice den.
customer_reviews.author: LogicalAmbriel

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the ship in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the ship in the bottle, it was a nice classy detail to the beautiful wood. The only thing I would like to have different is the cork. I wish it was just about any other color than the gold that it is because it really distracts from the clean classy look of the rest of the item. I would have make it, glass, crystal or brushed nickel. All around it is still a beautiful piece and I am glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and SUPER fragile
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** one of the glasses broke, so be careful!! ***This is really beautiful and my husband loves it. The stopper is hard to put in and we are afraid to break it because the glass is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and it looks awesome on my desk. I love it so much I just bought one now to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: sanoJ

customer_reviews.title: No cups in box very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend for his 30th birthday today he opened it and no cups. There are holes for the cups but no actual cups in the box. Very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A fine decanter for good spirits.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set. The stand is solid, stable and well designed. The glasses are standard sized rocks glasses and the decanter is larger than I expected. The glass work is very nice with crisp etching and the ship is more detailed and attractive than the pictures could show. I’m very happy with this. I’ll be using it as both a show piece and service set.
customer_reviews.author: G.F.F.

customer_reviews.title: SMALL but INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up as gift for a friends promotion to Detective. Its looks fantastic on his desk. Only gripe is the globe is a bit smaller than I anticipated, thats my fault for not reading the description!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Just like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Update: We've had this on our sailboat for a few months now. We really like the style, but the white continents have turned black. Not sure why. Our boat is relatively cool and never goes over 80 degrees inside. We keep it on a shelf that is shielded from sunlight. Just like in the picture. Very nice. Holds about 700 milliliters. Nothing has come off yet, but given that someone wrote that the etchings rub off, we're being careful not to wipe them too hard. Very attractive sitting on the shelf behind the settee on our boat.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Peranteau

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, classy, sophisticated decanter. My husband is a whiskey and scotch snob and for once I wanted to get him something that he wasn’t expecting. We are big history buffs and love collecting maps so this fits perfectly with our decor. The craftsman ship is excellent and it is a truly stunning piece. I can’t wait to give it to him on his birthday in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: TheTattooedMom

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty however extremely small. This is definitely an item that’s more for show... that is if you’re displaying it on a mini bar. (Pun intended). Do not look to pour an entire bottle of anything into this. It might hold 1/2, at best. Rather disappointing yet too late to return. Gave two stars due to the size of the decanter & glasses. Not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: JessH

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed at all with this product. It looks really cheap and inst well made or finished. The glasses are like something you would buy at a dollar store and are really light. Th globe?decanter itself doesn't look to bad from a distance but has a really cheap base and the plastic stopper is almost impossible to remove without fear of snapping the neck off the globe. I was very disappointed and embarrassed as i had bought this as a gift. I should have known for the price!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: the center jewel of my bar.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product so far. I think there are decanters to use and the ones to decorate. This one is for decoration and I am cool with that. I have a little bar and this is the center jewel. Put the whisky I less like inside just for the color and it looks awesome. If you are planning to use this regularly, then you should probably buy something more stiff.
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: JUST ONE MINOR GRIPE....
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, this is a great set, and it would make a nice gift. My one gripe is that the gauge of the glass is pretty thin, both decanter and glasses, and I worry about accidentally breaking a piece. If the glass was more substantial, I would probably rate this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Made of Candy Glass
customer_reviews.text: Had it one week before I tapped the side against the holder and broke. Complete garbage unless you place it for display only.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and worthless
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Not worth the money and not refundable. It was a bad investment. The design is washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mirvat

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of work. Needs to be a little sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We gifted this for a housewarming and were invited later to their house where they served a single malt in from this Decanter. First impression - it catches your attention right away. The ship inside is very well made and the world on the glass is really cool. Obviously, everyone in the room wanted one for their own. The cons : Needs to be a little sturdier. the glass is very fragile and the stem which holds this can very easily break.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and the cork thing was broken and stuck inside the bottle. I was able to return it without any issues. I do want to rebuy one in the future for him. The glasses are absolutely beautiful. I did see they have a 4 glass set instead of just the 2 set one this one is, so I’ll prob buy that one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: For the $60 I paid, this should have been nicer, heavier and more solid. The wood base didn't have an even amount of stain on it, had scratches. The glasses and decanter themselves are very thin glass. They did come with minor scratches on the glass, too. Overall it's pretty from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: MnFosterMama

customer_reviews.title: Fascinating!
customer_reviews.text: my husband absolutely loved this beautiful gift. The intricacies are amazing with so many details. The ship in the bottle is the closest thing I've seen. Very fun to bring out with guests because they're always impressed with how fascinating this decanter is.
customer_reviews.author: Family shopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE - makes a impressive gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love - love - love this product. I purchased this for my husband as a housewarming present and he loved it. The design and presentation are beautiful. Much nicer than I had anticipated. Ours did arrive with a little ship inside the bottle broken but we were able to re-order and get a replacement. Makes a great gift when you want to impress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaged perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described. Was worried how it was going to be shipped but it was shipped packages so it wouldn’t break. It was smaller than I thought but still perfect gift for retirement gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration or gift item.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It would make a great gift (although I plan on keeping it for myself). No issues with packaging. I initially bought a gold color liquor to fill this with, as showed in the photo, but then I got the idea that UV Blue vodka would look better, and I definitely think it does. It makes it look like the ocean. As you can see by my photo, I probably filled the globe too full, making the ship inside look like it’s sinking, but that’s what happen when you drink too much. Overall, I would definitely recommend this as a gift or for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product was well worth the buy, I bought piece to add to my house decor , Well packaged and not a single crack, perfect condition! This would also make a perfect gift for someone. I WOULD have to say if your hesitant don't be because it's beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Whiskey decanter
customer_reviews.text: The globe design inside came broken. I need a replacement item or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: TheDR

customer_reviews.title: All things aren't what they appear to be!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to receive the decanter, however the golden decanter knob did NOT come as illustrated in the product illustration. A plain plastic decanter knob accompanied the product. That was a disappointment. It would be appreciated, If you could send me the gold plated knob, as presented in the original product illustration. Other than that, it is a beautifully designed flask and mounted global display.
customer_reviews.author: Yanza

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the item was broken upon arrival and was mostly likely due to there being so many packages delivered to the address I gave but still buy this! The only thing that didnt make it was the ship inside but when you look at everything else it's amazing and beautiful works of art.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality just got decoration
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and was a lovely gift however very cheap and poor quality. The very first time the stopper was put in and then pulled to remove the rubber got stuck in the bottle and the top came off in my hand. Have been unable to get the stopper out so basically cannot be used and now just something to look at. Good job I didn't put the alcohol in first.......
customer_reviews.author: Emi23

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous globe shaped wine decanter set!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous globe shaped wine decanter set! Beautifully made very sturdy! Comes with a decanter would stand in to whiskey glasses! Perfect gift for the whiskey lover in your life! Amazing price under $55!
customer_reviews.author: krystle stolleis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for my parents. They have a small library in their home, and the stain matches this set. It is absolutely stunning. It is not a heavy set, so if you are looking for something sturdy and weighted, this may no be for you. The attention to detail of the ship inside is so beautiful, and the etchings on the glasses is intricate! I highly recommend this for anyone looking for an interesting statement piece.
customer_reviews.author: ¤Krys¤

customer_reviews.title: Scratches on globe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for housewarming gift for my brother. The presentation of the product is nice, however the globe and the golden ball on top of it was full of scratches. It was almost like it was a used product. It was an embarrassment for me to gift this as it did not look like it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Saransh

customer_reviews.title: While this was a personal purchase I would recommend as a gift option
customer_reviews.text: This is a classy way to store whiskey or bourbon. The decanter couples well with a cigar box I have sitting on my bar top and creates a more distinguished look. While this was a personal purchase I would recommend as a gift option.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought decanter for my husband for our anniversary. He was disappointed when he opened it and found the decanter broken (the glasses were fine). I was able to return the next day and 3 days later received a new one (which was really fast!). My husband loves the decanter!...it is well made very classy looking and a fun unique gift. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional & fun
customer_reviews.text: The stopper is tacky. That’s undeniable, but the rest is nice! It’s not a heavyweight piece, this ain’t etched lead crystal, but for the price & purpose, it’s excellent. We have several wine stoppers and switch ours out, it seems like nearly all regular wine stoppers fit. The one that comes with it is really horrid.
customer_reviews.author: michael a favacchia

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a buddy if mine who is transferring to a different unit across the country. It's perfect. I was able to customize it as well to make it more memorable for his Navy career and it's very good quality. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great item check carefully for defects!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed since this evidently was shipped with defect. Looked ok on cursory exam but recipient advised some time afterwards there was a major crack thru the bottle portion. Clearly not giftable although nice looking decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend for Valentines Day. He uses it for his Whiskey and Brandy and is incredibly happy with it! The etching on the glass of the map on all objects is not an accurate version of the map which is why I have it 4 stars for Craftsmanship but the product is otherwise very we crafted and as I mentioned my boyfriend loves it. Great gift idea for your sig fig.
customer_reviews.author: WhipTailKat

customer_reviews.title: Horrible I need a response ASAP
customer_reviews.text: I demand a refund, this was a gift and my husband just tried to take the cork part off to wash it and fill it up with liquid and the plastic part of it got stuck inside the “globe” and now we can’t take it out. Defeats the entire purpose of this piece I’m very disappointed and I Expect a full refund because we can’t use it if it doesn’t have a cork. This was 55$ dollars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice decanter set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this decanter set for my husband and he was very pleased with it. I was, however, a little disappointed in the size of the product. For the price, I thought it would be more impressive in size. The ship in the decanter is a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: H. White

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It is a very pretty set. It is delicate, you just have to handle it with care. Gift for my husband. We love how you can rotate the decanter so that you can focus on a particular section of the world. It is definitely a great gift for someone who enjoys cocktails. I've had several friends visit who commented on how nice it is. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: For whisky and world lovers 😍
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful! So classy and elegant for not much money! My fiancé loves whiskey and is a huge geography geek. I don’t think I could have come up with anything better than this! Well made, displays wonderfully! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The know to open it broke off the first time I tried to use it, now it’s useless
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: A great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I had to return one because our friend no longer wanted to exchange gifts. . . his loss. LOL This is an amazing gift. Probably the best one I've ever chosen. LOL The other decanter is for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Made well, but small!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas Gift. The decanter itself is a little smaller than I thought it would be. But the craftsmanship makes up for it! The person I purchased it for, loved it & it’s a great piece for a bar!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow! I can not say enough about this piece! I gave this as a gift to my best friend and he loved it!!!! He loved it and was soo appreciative, I will be buying another for a special guy.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas. It looks just like the photos and feels durable and well made. A little smaller than I expected but still very elegant and beautiful. Perfect to just have as decor or to use when guests are over. Overall very happy with purchase and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic decanter set!
customer_reviews.text: My Husband LOVES it! He was born on Christmas so every year I try to make his birthday special and this was just perfect. It's unique, beautifully crafted and arrived on time. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Odell

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces received 😞
customer_reviews.text: The decanter would be so awesome if it has arrived in one piece.. it was damaged and broken into pieces when arrived.. the two glasses were all intact and the wooden holder but the main decanter was shattered. I was so excited when I received my order but was so heart broken when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tanishqua bhandari

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The gift is beautiful. However, the first time filling it with liquid and the ship broke off
customer_reviews.author: Chyan

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this order delivered to me in just one day. Thanks Amazon. Decanter has a very nice look .Globe is not very big and it looks extremely delicate so have to handle carefully. Ship inside looks the best .Whiskey glass looks elegant but again very delicate. So don’t drink with friends who gets too drunk and might break you set. Overall I am satisfied with the product and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Choudhary

customer_reviews.title: Great Decanter for Nautical Themed Room
customer_reviews.text: This is a great accent decanter for a nautical themed room. It is perfect for our beach house! It is not too large and the ship suspended inside the globe makes for a very interesting design.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this decanter set as a valentine's day gift for my husband. The work base, decanter, and glasses are a very good quality for the cost. Similar to what someone else had mentioned, the stopper is a very cheap gold finish. However, I am very happy with the purchase - the stopper can always be spray painted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whiskey Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend's dad, he's a whiskey guy and he loves it. Very decorative and appears to give the room some class. Highly recommend as a gift or something for a living room if you drink whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: I LOOOVE!!!!!! This piece!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. Glassware is a favorite of mine; so, when i saw it i had yo have it. There's no wine or anything in it as of yet, but it may come soon. Looking at it on my creative bookshelf is satisfying enough for now.
customer_reviews.author: EyeAm8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Truly love everything about this purchase! Gave it as a gift and have received nothing but positive feedback from people on the appearance and durability of it. Note the globe can hold an entire fifth. Definitely worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Ecbell

customer_reviews.title: Whiskey decanter
customer_reviews.text: This is soo pretty! I can't wait to give it to my husband. The glass work is so detailed and amazing. This would be an awesome gift or even a display piece. It is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun way to display your favorite whiskey! Bought it as a gift. Hubby will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Momma w/ no Drama

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome, and it’s really well secured in the box for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend, so I can’t speak to the durability of the product. But, because it’s mostly glass, I opened the box to check on everything before giving it to my friend. Everything was fine. It’s all really securely held in place by form fitting styrofoam pieces. Also, it looks really cool. It was exactly what I expected from the pictures. If I didn’t already have a couple of decanters, I would buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Goodfellow

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is not as large as I thought it would be, but it is well made and very unique. It was a gift for my husband and he was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lolly B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to look at
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Christmas. It's really nice to look at and has a lot of detail. Only problem is that the stopper is kind of cheap and it's hard to get out. In fact it came in two pieces. Other than that it's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: given as a Christmas gift.. Bought two, for both of my sons .. They loved it .. Unique, beautiful and practical. Quite a conversation started
customer_reviews.author: Stella K.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Design! Love this Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loveee this product! I bought It for my roommate and enjoy seeing this product on my bar everyday. It looks extremely fancy and well crafted. The glasses and decanter are beautifully designed. Make sure you put some fancy whiskey inside and let that ship float in style :)! Will definitely be purchasing this again for gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jayceelo

customer_reviews.title: Great For Bars Without Cats
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Surprisingly nice quality for the price. Feels like it’s fairly fragile so keep that in mind, but really cool on top a bar without cats.
customer_reviews.author: beagle47

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND LOVED THIS!!! I purchased this as an anniversary gift and it was successful!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Nipper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is a beautifully crafted decanter set! The etching on the cups and globe is smooth to the touch and the blown glass ship inside the globe is absolutely stunning. I definitely won at gift giving with this one. So much so my Dad told me he wanted them same one for his Birthday! It was super fast shipping and very well packed. I'd highly recommend this to anyone who has an appreciation for whiskey and a desire for superb functional art.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured. Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I wa so nervous that it would arrive damaged. The packaging is perfect. Almost too perfect! I had a hard time getting it unboxed to check for damages. Here’s a hint - open the bottom carefully and push it out the top. It’s a wonderfully made set. It looks a bit small but what do I know - I don’t drink. It will go perfect in my ex husband’s apartment so he can entertain his next dream girl 😝
customer_reviews.author: Deborah N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is really just as beautiful as it looks in the picture. It's glass, so don't throw it around, but it feels like it will last a long time as long as nobody drops it on the tile. Great gift for my dad for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: dreamyraynbo

customer_reviews.title: Elegant look
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and easy to assemble. It really add class to any bar or book shelf. It's also very attractive to the eye. Great gift
customer_reviews.author: Tynie

customer_reviews.title: More beautiful than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sons for Christmas. I can’t tell you how pleased I was with these. They were beautifully designed and excellently crafted. Well worth the money. Both my sons were very pleased with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: hvlovesagooddeal

customer_reviews.title: Well made but needs better plug
customer_reviews.text: The entire set is well crafted but the decanter plug could be better. It came with a plug that feels cheap and has a plastic ridge. The same plug with cork or a better quality plastic ridge would have been nice. It also doesn't push in all of the way.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas, I am confident he's going to love out. It looks beautiful and elegant. It will look so nice in his office!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Looks great bf was happy
customer_reviews.text: Got for bf for xmas he has a nice bar at home and this is a great addition it is small but thats ok bc its still a very intricate & interesting piece bought him whiskey chiller bullets to go with he was pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: There's a ship in the decanter!
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome! I think I was expecting it to look bigger when I got it for my fiance, but it still is large. The base for the glasses and the decanter is wonderful. It looks very fancy, and perfect for our speakeasy themed basement bar.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My ice breaker  Conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and delicate.Came well pack. I'm using it for my wine on my living room. When my girlfriends come over we chat and drink wine ,so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Micale

customer_reviews.title: Looks impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for son-in-law. He said it was a fine and useful addition to his extensive collection of decanter and glasses. The etched globe on the decanter and also on the matching glasses gave it an extra bit of elegance.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Niessen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my friend’s 50th birthday. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: GeGe Watts

customer_reviews.title: Bespoke, Artful
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this decanter. It only adds to the beauty when you fill the globe with your beverage of choice. Expertly crafted from quality materials. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MissyLue

customer_reviews.title: Nice Way to Show Off Whiskey!
customer_reviews.text: This trinket is a wonderful addition to my home bar. To those who have traveled or dream to, this is a fantastic piece of art to contemplate our favorite libation!
customer_reviews.author: Eldon E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Only worth buying when deeply discounted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a short term sale as a gift for my husband. I would say it was worth the money when I bought it at the lower price, but I would not recommend paying for it at regular price. It arrived with scratches on the wood and marks on the gold cap. Fortunately the damage isn't major, and it will still make a good Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Beep

customer_reviews.title: The only way to drink. AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST BUY if a friend or yourself enjoys a nice sip. This set is BEAUTIFUL. Very well made. Grat packaging to prevent any breaking. Nothing broken on my end but remember... it is glass.. stuff happens. The cups are a great size. The ship inside is amazing and well crafted.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than i expected. You have to have a very small amount of alcohol in the decanter to get the look shown in the picture. It still looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: damien white

customer_reviews.title: Uniquely different!
customer_reviews.text: This decanter set is stunning!! The artistry in the glass work is magnificent! Thankyou for creating such a beautiful piece of art
customer_reviews.author: Rosie 2Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unique gift
customer_reviews.text: It's a unique gift that you don't see at everyone's house or office. Even if you giftie doesn't drink they can put colored water in for the ship's ocean.
customer_reviews.author: bill ben

customer_reviews.title: Fiancé LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Came across this and thought it was perfect for my fiance! Had to buy it even tho no holiday or birthday was coming up. Great product for a great price! Fits nicely on our liquor cabinet/wine rack. He says he'll put it in his office when he's CEO one day haha. I love the boat on the inside. So well done
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I very classy gift that anyone with a bar will love.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and he loved it. The craftsmanship is beautiful and the quality of the wooden stand wonderful. I strongly recommend this decanter.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This item is gorgeous. Perfect for a old Navy man. Excellent price. The whiskey that I put in this cost nearly as much as the globe itself. Thanks Gary
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: The gold colored stopper on the decanter has got to go. Cheap and tacky. Otherwise an excellent gift for the holidays. Small size makes it fit on bar or table top. Probably more to look at than actually use. A bit large for most women's hands. Very attractive and unique. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: John Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, needs funnel!
customer_reviews.text: Great decoration and durable stand! Just wish it came with a funnel to make it easier to fill up!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Can’t keep my hands off this product! I love them and bought 3 so far. My friends and family love them. They’re beautifully made and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlette E. Nestor

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gift! My brother loved it. It’s a unique thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: anushmr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful conversation piece!
customer_reviews.text: The etching is beautiful! I bought this for my best friend who is a whiskey drinker. This sits on the counter in his kitchen and is a conversation piece. The glasses add an extra touch. The product is very classy!
customer_reviews.author: JustHoskins

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken in transit. Very beautiful quality.
customer_reviews.text: This would get 5 stars but it keeps shipping busted. I really want to get an unbroken set for gifting this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Canary

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and functional, son in law loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for son in law who says he doesn't want anything. He loves a nip of whiskey now and then and this is beautiful and functional ,he loves it. Not just one of those pretty things that will sit on a shelf. He used it immediately and it looks great in his bar.
customer_reviews.author: Constance J. Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: This globe decanter is classy and sturdy. I can't wait to give it to my boyfriend for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Smith

product_meta.title: Whiskey Decanter Globe Set with 2 Etched Globe Whisky Glasses - for Liquor, Scotch, Bourbon, Vodka - 850ml
feature_bullets: Hand blown elegant whiskey decanter dispenser featuring an etched globe design and antique ship in the bottle will undoubtedly enhance your drinking experience while making a bold impression.

Patented set includes whisky decanter with 2 matching globe design old fashioned whiskey glasses fitted onto mahogany stained tray. Gold stopper adds a touch of class while keeping your spirits sealed.
Lead free decanter capacity: 850ml - Cocktail glass: 300ml
Great gift and conversation piece at any party. Can also be used to serve water, juice, iced tea and other beverages.

Since 1973 Godinger has specialized in handcrafted silver, pewter, crystal, stainless, and alternative metal giftware. From wedding gifts, candlesticks, barware, bakeware, tea sets and frames, you are sure to find the perfect item for any special occasion. Godinger products are available at all major retailers across the US and Canada.
